message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $180, so I'll offer it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make a small concession, so I'll offer it to you for $160
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'll offer it to you for $165
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm not willing to go below $155, as that would leave me with a loss. I'll offer it to you for $155, and that's my final offer
I understand that you're not willing to go below $155, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'll make a final offer of $150, and if you're willing to meet me there, I'll make the deal.
